name: Sales VAT
query:
SELECT 
	salesInv.name as "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:200",
	salesInv.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:120",
	salesInv.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
	salesInv.base_net_total as "Net Total Amount:100",
  	salesInvItem.item_name as "Item Name:100",
  	salesInvItem.qty as "Qty:100",
    salesInvItem.base_net_amount as "Net Amount:100",
    salesInv.taxes_and_charges as "Sales Taxes and Charges:100",
    transTax.charge_type as "Charge Type:100",
    case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then transTax.account_head else itemTaxDetail.tax_type end as "Tax Type:100",
    case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then transTax.rate else itemTaxDetail.tax_rate end as "Tax Rate:100",
    case when isnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_type) then salesInvItem.base_net_amount*ifnull(transTax.rate/100,0) else salesInvItem.base_net_amount*ifnull(itemTaxDetail.tax_rate/100,0) end as "Tax Amount:100"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` as salesInv inner join
`tabSales Invoice Item` as salesInvItem on salesInv.name = salesInvItem.parent left outer join 
`tabItem Tax Template Detail` as itemTaxDetail on salesInvItem.item_tax_template=itemTaxDetail.parent left outer join
`tabSales Taxes and Charges` as transTax on salesInv.taxes_and_charges=transTax.parent
WHERE salesInv.docstatus>0 and salesInv.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and salesInv.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
